Description: Egyptian imitation of Cypriot Black-on-Red ware pottery juglet; ovoid body with narrow, slightly raised disc base; concave neck, flaring towards the mouth; neck-ridge half way up the height of the neck; vertical handle from shoulder to neck-ridge; red, gritty clay with red slip, decorated in black paint; narrow bands around the shoulder, with broader bands around the neck; black paint in the outer surface of the handle; burnished surface.
